title: The Main Digital Asset Trends in 2019
text:
What are the main digital asset trends in the near future? Cryptonews.com had a chance to talk with the representatives of a few major companies in the field of cryptocurrency and blockchain, who attended this year’s Baltic Honeybadger conference held in September in Riga, Latvia. We've talked with Jameson Lopp from Casa, Dan Held from Kraken Digital Asset Exchange, Samson Mow from Blockstream, Alex Petrov from Bitfury, and Francis Pouliot of Bull Bitcoin.

Liked this video? Subscribe to Cryptonews
